EmailTemplate.name: Initial VIP Introduction
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Borrego Solar's VIP Experience!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
On behalf of Borrego Solar, I want to welcome you to the VIP Experience! You are among a select few clients chosen to be part of this new initiative intended to enhance your overall customer experience. As Borrego Solar's newly appointed Customer Experience Manager, I'll be introducing you to a VIP program developed to reward you for your business and continued support.
What is included within the VIP Experience?
路 An Online Customer Portal featuring a comprehensive portfolio of product information, real-time system updates and the ability to report a problem to our Operations & Maintenance department at any time, day or night
路 A Customer Appreciation Program including social events, giveaways and a robust referral program that rewards you for acting as a reference and referring new customers
路 Advanced Monitoring of your solar installation's output and delivery of detailed system performance reports
路 Free Community Education Sessions for the audience of your choice focused on renewable energy and the positive impact of your solar installation
The VIP Experience is our way of saying "Thank You" for being one of our most valued customers.
I'll be in touch in the next few days to introduce myself and get you set up on the Customer Portal. If you have any questions in the meantime, please don't hesitate to reach out to me directly.
Thanks you for your business and I look forward to connecting with you soon.
Tommy Sunderland
Want to help us design your ultimate VIP Experience? Please take a moment to voice your opinion in our VIP Survey.
